title: Lessons from Emerging Market Economies on the Sources of Sustained Growth
content: For release on delivery  5:00 p.m. EDT   September 28, 2011    Lessons from Emerging Market Economies on the Sources of Sustained Growth    Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Cleveland Clinic “Ideas for Tomorrow” Series     Cleveland, Ohio    September 28, 2011
